name: Fantasy Roboninja
description:
Kill anime girls with Roboninja!!! How long can you survive against anime girls???

I developed it when I got bored.

Round and difficulty system will be added.

All 3D models and animations are imported.

______________________________________________________

Controls:

"W, A, S, D" to move.

"Space" to jump.

Attack with mouse.

"T" to DANCE! (It's important.)
